svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;
svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/132.0.0.0 Safari/537.36" version="28.1.1"> <diagram name="第 1 页" id="WC787fw0HtNOpKHZxPIC"> <mxGraphModel dx="1426" dy="756" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="gG3xCSgoYg_-4IKTxRVL-6" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="gG3xCSgoYg_-4IKTxRVL-1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="360" y="200" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="gG3xCSgoYg_-4IKTxRVL-1" value="<b><font style="font-size: 15px;">Web请求</font></b>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="320" y="120" width="80" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="gG3xCSgoYg_-4IKTxRVL-8" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="1" source="gG3xCSgoYg_-4IKTxRVL-7"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="360" y="320" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="gG3xCSgoYg_-4IKTxRVL-7" value="<span style="font-size: 15px;"><b>App:run()</b></span><div><span style="font-size: 15px;"><b>根据请求信息创建req对象，res对象</b></span></div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="240" y="200" width="240" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="gG3xCSgoYg_-4IKTxRVL-11" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="gG3xCSgoYg_-4IKTxRVL-9" target="gG3xCSgoYg_-4IKTxRVL-10"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="gG3xCSgoYg_-4IKTxRVL-9" value="<div style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14px; line-height: 19px; white-space: pre;"><b>App:handle(req,res,callback)</b></div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="240" y="320" width="240" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="gG3xCSgoYg_-4IKTxRVL-12" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="gG3xCSgoYg_-4IKTxRVL-10"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="360" y="480" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="gG3xCSgoYg_-4IKTxRVL-10" value="<div style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14px; line-height: 19px; white-space: pre;"><b>App.router<span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 255);">:</span>handle(req,res,done)</b></div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="200" y="400" width="320" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="gG3xCSgoYg_-4IKTxRVL-17" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="1" source="gG3xCSgoYg_-4IKTxRVL-13"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="360" y="800" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="gG3xCSgoYg_-4IKTxRVL-13" value="<div style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14px; line-height: 19px; white-space: pre;"><div style="color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(237, 237, 237));"><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 255);"><b><font style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">local path = req.path</font></b></span></div><div style=""><b style="color: rgb(0, 0, 255);"><font style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">local</font></b><b style=""><font><font style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);"><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);"> </span></font><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">matched = </span><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);"><font>router</font></span><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">.trie</span><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 255);">:</span><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">match(path)</span></font></b></div></div><div><b>在路由树中根据请求中的url匹配早先已经定义好的节点，并且匹配的关键规则是：</b><span style="color: rgb(0, 128, 0); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14px; white-space: pre;">优先匹配静态路由，实在匹配不到再进行动态路由匹配</span></div><div><span style="color: rgb(0, 128, 0); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14px; white-space: pre;"><br></span></div><div><span style="color: rgb(0, 128, 0); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14px; white-space: pre;"><div style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 19px;"><div style="text-align: left;"><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 255);">matched</span> = {</div><div style="text-align: left;"> -- 最终匹配到的静态/动态节点</div><div style="text-align: left;"> node</div><div style="text-align: left;">&nbsp; -- 动态理由节点的参数集合，比如:<span style="color: rgb(163, 21, 21);">":xxx(正则)"</span>中的xxx</div><div style="text-align: left;">&nbsp; -- xxx - 对应路径字符串</div><div style="text-align: left;">&nbsp; <span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 255);">params</span> = {<span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 255);">key</span>=val,...},</div><div style="text-align: left;">&nbsp; -- 根节点到node完整路径节点数组</div><div style="text-align: left;">&nbsp; <span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 255);">pipeline</span> = {根节点，中间节点们，node},</div><div style="text-align: left;">}</div></div></span></div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="160" y="480" width="400" height="280" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="gG3xCSgoYg_-4IKTxRVL-19" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="gG3xCSgoYg_-4IKTxRVL-18"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="360" y="960" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="gG3xCSgoYg_-4IKTxRVL-18" value="<div style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14px; line-height: 19px; white-space: pre;"><div style="color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(237, 237, 237));"><div style="line-height: 19px;"><span style="color: rgb(0, 128, 0);">{根节点中间件s，子节点们中间件s，当前节点中间件s，当前节点处理函数s}</span></div><div style="line-height: 19px;"><span style="color: rgb(0, 128, 0);">如果上传过程发生错误</span></div><div style="line-height: 19px;"><span style="color: rgb(0, 128, 0);">{当前节点错误中间件s，子节点们错误中间件s，根节点错误中间件s}</span></div><div style="line-height: 19px;"><span style="color: rgb(0, 128, 0);">执行顺寻，就是从左到右</span></div></div></div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="80" y="800" width="560" height="120" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="gG3xCSgoYg_-4IKTxRVL-20" value="<b><font style="font-size: 15px;">Web请求返回</font></b>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="280" y="960" width="170" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 78px; height: 1px; padding-top: 20px; margin-left: 241px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.b: 在路由树中根据请求中的url匹配早先已经定义好的节点，并且匹配的关键规则是：
